mapper.select:
SELECT t1.USER_ID USER_ID , t1.USER_NAME USER_NAME , t1.USER_REGION_MASTER USER_REGION_MASTER , t1.USER_REGION_MASTER_NAME USER_REGION_MASTER_NAME , t1.USER_REGION_DETAIL USER_REGION_DETAIL , t1.USER_REGION_DETAIL_NAME USER_REGION_DETAIL_NAME , CASE LENGTH(t1.USER_PHONE) WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(t1.USER_PHONE, 3), '-', MID(t1.USER_PHONE, 4, 4), '-', RIGHT(t1.USER_PHONE, 4)) END USER_PHONE FROM ( SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_REGION_MASTER , F_GET_CODE_NAME('REM', USER_REGION_MASTER) USER_REGION_MASTER_NAME , USER_REGION_DETAIL , F_GET_CODE_NAME('RGD', USER_REGION_DETAIL) USER_REGION_DETAIL_NAME
FROM tb_user
WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID = #{userId} ) t1

select.foreach:
SELECT CASE WHEN STATUS_001 = '001_OK' THEN 'O' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '09:00:00' THEN 'X' ELSE '-' END END AS STATUS_001,
CASE WHEN STATUS_002 = '002_OK' THEN 'O' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '17:00:00' THEN 'X' ELSE '-' END END AS STATUS_002,
CASE WHEN STATUS_003 = '003_OK' THEN 'O' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '23:00:00' THEN 'X' ELSE '-' END END AS STATUS_003
FROM ( SELECT IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '001' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{item.userId}), '001_OK', '001_NO') AS STATUS_001, IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '002' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{item.userId}), '002_OK', '002_NO') AS STATUS_002, IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '003' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{item.userId}), '003_OK', '003_NO') AS STATUS_003
) AS A
